title: Steer 270
creator_credit: Vincent Donovan, Brian Voce and Australia. Navy Office. Directorate of Public Relations
brief_description: Follows a task force made up of the ships Perth, Derwent and Supply, of the Royal Australian Navy on a good will cruise of Mauritius Island, Mombasa, Karachi, Singapore, and Sydney.
